responsibilities.responsibility: Built a React web application from scratch, gaining experience with TypeScript and modern UI component libraries while applying best practices in front-end development.
Developed a mobile-first web application with responsive design, ensuring optimal user experience across devices.
Collaborated with front-end and back-end teams, as well as the project manager, to deliver bug fixes and implement new features based on requirements.
Translated Figma designs into fully functional and visually consistent application interfaces.
Investigated and resolved reported technical issues to enhance system stability and performance.
Designed, developed, and deployed new features based on business and technical requirements.
Worked closely with the QA team to identify, replicate, and resolve reported bugs.
Coordinated with the mobile development team to ensure seamless integration between web and mobile platforms.
Contributed to Agile development cycles by providing QA insights during sprints, stand-up meetings, retrospectives, and reviews.
Designed and optimized SQL queries for backend development to efficiently retrieve and return data as JSON responses for API integration.
Developed and maintained RESTful APIs using HTTP methods to support frontend and mobile applications.
Documented API endpoints, workflow, and debugging procedures for better team collaboration and future reference.
